job_description: About Cenovus:Cenovus Energy is a Canadian oil company. We are committed to applying fresh, progressive thinking to safely and responsibly unlock energy resources the world needs. Our operations include oil sands projects in northern Alberta, which use specialized methods to drill and pump the oil to the surface. As well, we have established natural gas and oil production in Alberta and Saskatchewan. We also have 50 percent ownership in two U.S. refineries. The future looks pretty exciting, and as a student or new grad we hope you think so too. We're always on the lookout for enthusiastic high-achievers who want jobs with accountability, who can bring fresh ideas to the table, and who are willing to learn from some of the industry's most innovative and talented people.Work Environment:This is a student position based in the Calgary office. The Calgary office is closed the 1st and 3rd Friday of every month.About this opportunity:Cenovus is looking for students enrolled in their first year of an Geoscience Technology or Petroleum Technology Program. This is a four month position, with possibility for extension, and will be based in Calgary, Alberta.
